Title: Provides for the payment of state aid to the town of New Hudson and special districts therein for state land operated by the department of environmental conservation
Summary: Provides for the payment of state aid to the town of New Hudson and special districts therein for state land operated by the department of environmental conservation.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-b, Pub Lds L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public lands law, in relation to the payment of state aid on account of certain state lands in the town of New Hudson, in the county of Allegany
